entry.title: Postcards From LA
entry.summary:
Author: catniss_37

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,731Chapters: 5/11Kudos: 14

Summary: Eddie catches that redeye flight back to El Paso and returns to life in Texas with Christopher, and everything is as it should be. It's different and juggling Christopher, basic training, his grief is hard, and adapting to living with his parents right there to question his every move is complicated, but here with Christopher is where he's meant to be. Right? But when Eddie gets a postcard in the mail from one Evan "Buck" Buckley, suddenly he's reminded that maybe everything isn't as fine as it seems and that everything important isn't just here in Texas.

entry.title: PTA Dad Wars: a dead wife, bi-erasure, and one very real, very tired First Sergeant of a husband
entry.summary:
Author: DamnSterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,853Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 147

Summary: Eds, So I might’ve accidentally joined the Parent Council? They asked for volunteers and somehow everyone stepped back except me? I think I got tricked. And suddenly I’m in a group chat with twelve mothers, a dad named Rick who has no spine, and a principal who types like she’s angry at the keyboard. Anyway, the moms are insane. They keep flirting with me. FLIRTING. I kept saying “I’m married,” and they kept going “oh that’s sweet, but we’ve never seen your wife.” YOUR WIFE??? Babe. I think this is bisexual erasure?? I’m being erased. I’m being doubted in my own bisexual existence. Do you know how insulting it is to have your very real, very hot husband dismissed because they’ve never seen him? I’m offended on behalf of our marriage. You need to come home before I have to bring Christopher as a witness. Miss you. A lot. —B. Ps. Chris is fine. He got an A+ for the science project.

entry.title: Broken Glass on the Table
entry.summary:
Author: xelise

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,422Chapters: 1/7Kudos: 4

Summary: It wasn’t the first time that Matthew hit Buck, or the second. But when the glass vase went flying at his head, and the pieces shattered into a beautiful and tragic kaleidoscope on the counter; it was then that Buck knew he couldn’t do it anymore. or: Buck is in an abusive relationship, and he doesn’t know how to ask for help. oh- and Eddie is leaving for Texas.

entry.title: Until I Found You...
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,438Chapters: 13/64Kudos: 150

Summary: Buck meets a guy in the grocery store, things, well escalate. Basically Buck gets a stalker, and enters a relationship with an abusive malipulative creep. Joe Goldberg was almost ready to leave LA with Henry, after killing his wife, Love Quinn.But when he stops at the grocery store on his way to the airport, he sees Buck and Buck has become his new obsession. Set after season 3 of You.Season 9 of 911.Bobby is alive, because that's how it should be. The story alternates POVs. Will be stated who POV it is. Mainly Joe and Buck, but others will have a random POV chapter here and there. Note: You don't have to watch YOU to read this. I'll provide enough context to get the idea. It's mostly set in the 911 universe. In this Joe never gives up Henry. Or,Buck is Joe Goldberg's new obsession.

entry.title: Echoes In The Dark
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,986Chapters: 6/40Kudos: 20

Summary: Evan Buckley wasn't always Evan Buckley. His real name is Ethan Matthews, and when he was eight years old he was stuck in a town he couldn't escape, but he did with his sister. Now years later, hiding his past things start to come out. Or, Buck is Ethan and Maddie is Julie from FROM. They got out after Jim died. Changed their names. Years later things start coming out. You don't have to watch from to read this, I'll give enough information throughout the fic.

entry.title: Fading Light
entry.summary:
Author: MissP20

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,645Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 13

Summary: When Eddie and Evan were children, the world felt small and safe—just the two of them against everything else. But one summer evening, Eddie was ripped away without warning, leaving Evan confused, alone, and aching for a friend he didn’t understand had been taken from him. Years later, they carry the weight of that separation, haunted by the what-ifs and the promises that could never be delivered.

entry.title: Maybe I should set my house on fire
entry.summary:
Author: phthalo_green_glass

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,495Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 54

Summary: “Who’s internet famous?” Buck asked.“Uh, apparently I am?” Eddie raised an eyebrow and looked to Hen.“Well yeah,” Chimney clapped his shoulder and turned to the group, “We’ve got our very own Daddy Diaz right here!”“I’m sorry, Daddy Diaz?” Eddie chuckled, bewildered. ---Eddie makes a heroic save and now the internet won’t stop calling him Daddy Diaz. Hen thinks it’s hilarious and Chim definitely isn’t jealous. But Buck is having a hard time keeping his cool. It’s rough when your best friend (who you’re secretly in love with, of course) doesn’t know you have a Daddy kink. Sure hope they don’t make a mess of things.

entry.title: Tell Me Why Can't This Be Love?
entry.summary:
Author: Frawg_Spawn

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,723Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 249

Summary: "It's fine, Jee," Eddie says. "Buck doesn't have to kiss me." "Yes he does." Jee crosses her arms and looks sternly at Buck. "Daddy and Mommy kiss every time when they go away from each other." "Yeah, okay." Buck sucks in a breath and steps towards Eddie. He ducks his head down and presses the most fleeting kiss to Eddie's cheek. "Not like that," Jee scolds. "What? Why not?" Buck squawks. "Because," she sighs and gives him a long, disapproving look. "Mommy and Daddy always kiss on the lips." ~ or, buddie babysit Jee while being pretend boyfriends

entry.title: Passing Notes
entry.summary:
Author: writedontfight

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,775Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 98

Summary: Buck's woodworking breakup hobby was short-lived. But he did manage to make one thing that was decent: a Little Free Library. Little did he know, it would bring him something much more exciting than his neighbors' spare books. A rom com-inspired AU - “So, basically, you have a crush,” Maddie says with a smirk. “What? No! I’ve never had a conversation with him! Hell, I don’t even know what the guy looks like!” Buck insists, turning back to the pasta sauce that’s simmering on the stove. “I’m just saying he has really good taste in books, okay?” Maddie raises a disbelieving eyebrow. “Really good taste, and really queer taste…” “And?” Buck scoffs. “There are plenty of ugly, awful gay men in Los Angeles. I just got dumped by one.” He spoons out a bit of the marinara and holds it out to Maddie. “Here, taste this.” She does, and narrows her eyes slightly. “Mm, more basil I think.” “Are you sure?” Buck has a taste of his own and concedes, “Yeah, you’re absolutely right.” “I know,” Maddie says. “I’m right about most things.” “You’re right about the basil and only the basil.”

entry.title: Fast & Loose
entry.summary:
Author: Desscard

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,569Chapters: 1/8Kudos: 30

Summary: To his left, a cluster of young men, barely old enough to be in here, were living their lives through their phone screens. They preened and posed, muscles straining against designer t-shirts, capturing manufactured moments of joy for an audience that wasn't here. Buck felt a surge of contempt so sharp and sudden it almost made him flinch. He’d been that young once, though his own brand of youthful idiocy had also involved running into burning buildings, not just perfecting a pout for Instagram.To his right, a group of older men, their faces a roadmap of past disappointments, watched the younger crowd with a hungry, almost predatory nostalgia. They were looking for a night, an hour, a few minutes to feel like the men they used to be. Buck looked away. He was thirty-four, caught in the no-man’s-land between the two, and felt an uncomfortable kinship with both groups that made his skin crawl.This was a mistake. He should have stayed home.Or: A 34-year-old Buck and a 22-year-old Eddie meet at a gay bar and have sex about it. A lot of sex.

Summary: A bible tale comes alive. Fire rains from the sky. It's pretty much a typical day for the 118. But there is change in the air as the leaves begin to change color in preparation for the fall.
